title: 41: Libido, Squirting, and Making the Kitty Pretty with Dr. Felix
itunes:title: Libido, Squirting, and Making the Kitty Pretty with Dr. Felix
description:
Dr. Cherise Felix, MD., was so popular on the show last time that Bunnie wanted to bring her back to answer all your questions, no matter how weird and out there they are.

She talks about the expansion of her medical spa, The Service Station, including services now for men, and gives us advice about everything from IUD’s, how to revamp the sex drive after a hysterectory, menopause, and squirting.

She also shares a horror story about the craziest usage of paper towels known to man. 

 

Takeaways:

  • As an OBGYN, Dr. Felix has taken care of thousands of patients and brings both knowledge and empathy when working with their concerns about their bodies and health. 
  • The Service Station in Smyrna, TN offers everything from Body Contouring, GYN services, Laser Hair Removal, Hormone Replacement Therapy and now some services for men. It’s your place to get lifted, tucked, sucked, and just about every other service you can think of to make you the best version of yourself. 
  • Very supportive bras aren’t always the best thing for helping the boobies lift and stay up there — make sure you are also balancing it out with enough natural gravity. 
  • You can thank two glands on the side of the urethra for squirting, or female ejaculation. Some can do it easily, others have to find the sweet spot in which it occurs. 
  • If you are concerned about your libido, make sure you work with a physician to get a complete panel of your hormone levels. 
  • It’s important to also consider family history, genetics, and DNA when understanding why a miscarriage may occur. 
  • Make sure you know where your paper towel rolls are at all times, or else a doctor like Dr. Felix will have to go in and get ‘em. 

 

Quotes: 

  • “I think I’ve been perimenopausal since I was 19.” - B 
  • “I don’t think I’m a normal 40 year old, so I’ll go into menopause when I’m like 85.” - B 
  • “I’m the only Instagram model where you can’t find my vagina online.” - B
  • “At the end of all the sacrifice we made, we should be able to enjoy our life.” - Dr. Felix

 

Mentioned: 

Cherise Felix

The Service Station: Facebook | Instagram 

 

Check out Bunnie: 

@xomgitsbunnie

BunnieXo 

@officialdumbblonde
